import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './ProfilePage.css'; import icPay from '../images/icons/ic_pay.png'; import icReferal from '../images/icons/ic_referal.png'; import icSupport from '../images/icons/ic_support.png'; import icTrans from '../images/icons/ic_trans.png'; import icDoc from '../images/icons/ic_doc.png'; import icTut from '../images/icons/ic_tut.png'; import icCopy from '../images/icons/ic_copy.png'; function ProfilePage({ user, onBack }) { const [subscriptionLink] = useState('https://ultm.app/XMEEucdk'); const userName = user ? `${user.first_name || ''} ${user.last_name || ''}`.trim() || 'Пользователь' : 'Пользователь'; const userId = user?.telegram_id || user?.id || ''; const handleCopyId = () => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(String(userId)); }; const handleCopyLink = () => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(subscriptionLink); }; return (

Профиль

{userName}

id: {userId}
); } export default ProfilePage;
